name: Deep Fringe
storyline: Venture into dangerous endless territories, uncovering the secrets of the apocalypse that changed the world forever and the histories of rival factions with each expedition. Encounter a variety of characters and factions. Form alliances or incite rivalries, making strategic choices that forge your path and shape your story.
summary: Deep Fringe is deep tactical combat game set in a biopunk wasteland. Lead powerful factions in turn-based battles, leveraging the strategic use of an interactive environment. Modify or destroy terrain to achieve tactical supremacy. Craft legendary chapters with the level editor.
